summary.description: Allows the very rapid extraction of complete multipoint inheritance information from pedigrees of moderate size.Â This information is used in exact computation of multipoint LOD scores and in a method of non-parametric linkage analysis. The multipoint inheritance information allows the reconstruction of maximum-likelihood haplotypes for all individuals in the pedigree and information content mapping which measures the fraction of the total inheritance information extracted from the marker data.
